author: Fox News
title: Ground News - AI revolutionized the battlefield in 2023 as Israel, China lead development amid tech arms race
text:
Summary by Fox News The mainstream attention on artificial intelligence (AI) in 2023 allowed militaries to more openly discuss some of the astonishing initiatives they’ve undertaken as they race toward the future of warfare. AI presented an entirely different challenge and revealed an arms race many did not even know had already gotten well underway: Advanced and automated targeting capabilities, virtual environment weapon testing and AI-controlled vehicles presen… Share menu More
